name: Pro Pusher 64
description:
Pro Pusher 64 is an action puzzle game.
Blocks of different colors move towards the top of the screen. When your ball of the same color hits a block, you earn points.
Your life bar is slowly getting smaller...
But the more blocks you hit, the longer you stay alive!

Keyboard Controls:
Q - Green
A - White
Z - Red

More from Rogerty: https://rogerty.itch.io/
My Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rogerty
